Delicious ğŸ˜‹ I highly recommend Ramen Menya in Shinjuku. They provide a range of broths to please sophisticated palates including miso broth, pork bone broth, chicken broth, fish broth and lastly spicy broth. The spicy broth is toned down to suit the palates of the tourists. Of course they too serve food adapted for their own palate. The richness of broths is outstanding which can tempt demanding palates. The ramen texture is perfect that will please the most refined palate. I highly recommend it
